Beresheet Barah Elokim Et.translation: In the beginning God created the

Beresheet Barah.translation: In the beginning it was created

chest.heading: Location
chest.short: The division between Vessels of Bestowal (GE) and Vessels of Reception (AHP)
chest.long: When a Face is in a state of smallness, the upper part including the vessels Crown and Wisdom are kept intact while the lower part including the vessels Understanding, Beauty and Kingdom are detached to the face below. The division between them is called the Chest.
